author: just2good
title: Coatal Race
review:
I got this set on 5/22/10 at Toys'R'Us. It's pretty good.
Pros:
-Old Shark
-Trophy
-Awesome minifigures
-Fish cannon (lol)
Cons:
-Too much stickers :/
-The flag is sticker'ed! They could of just used the printed one!
-Should've had atleast one more minifigure (like a TV crew member)
-Fish cannon and spear do not launch far.

Overall, this set is okay.

author: legofan3810
title: Aaaah! Shark!
review:
This is a pretty nice set, and i like it a lot. The playability of this set is large and I'm glad this was my first world racers set. I got this set at toys r us and it is a good value for money. I recommend this set for anyone who wants to see Lego racers turn minifigure scale.

Pros

  • 2 awesome boats
  • Dual faced heads (my first ones!)
  • Shark
  • Cool silver trophy
  • Grappling hook
  • Great Playability

Cons

  • Building gets repetitive on white boat
  • A bit too many stickers
  • Chainsaws are hard to take off
  • Missile DOES NOT work!

A great set, few flaws, great addition to any water scene.

Overall, a 5/5

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO World Racers - Jagged Jaws Reef Review
review:
The built of this set is very easy and also lot's of fun. For my surprise this set doesn't come with numbered bags. You also get a lot of stickers which you have to put on. I think LEGO should print those pieces because they would be rare to find. We get a shark, a buoy with a trophy and the checkered flag for my surprise. On the older checkered flag pieces we didn't have to put on stickers in the past. This set also includes a boat for the Backyard Blasters and for the Team Extreme.

Both minifigs are very cool too. The Backyard Blasters character comes with the awsome printed overalls and helmet. On his face he has a bandanna and on the other side of the face you can see a scared face. The design with the sideburns looks a little bit like Elvis. The other minifig has a cool overall and helmet as well. On his face he got some goggles and a headset. The face of that Team Extreme minifig is double-printed.

The boats are very sturdy. The Backyard Blasters boat has some chain saw pieces. The engine on the back does sviwel and on the front we have a nice v6 engine and a harpoon. The engine is a little bit in the way if you want to push the harpoon. I recommend you to take the v6 engine off if you want to use this feature. The Team Extreme boat looks very awsome with those stickers. But as I said: The set would be much cooler if the markings are printed on the pieces. The main feature for this boat is the catapult which shoots fish. If you put the head of the fish in the keg the fish will fall out very easily. If you're not using this feature I recommend you to put this fish piece to the boat driver. All in all I can't really complain about this set.

All in all this set is a great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on LEGO Shop@Home, eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

author: Wolf_99
title: Great set, lots of fun with my son, I do admit that there is a lot of stickers
review:
Overall fun to build I have to admit also that there are a lot of stickers to apply, the torpedo fish is funny but doesn't go very far and the top of the barrell hits the top of the engine, this is my 2nd set I also own snake canyon and I will try to get the other sets.

my son really enjoys the shark, I wish that there was a 3rd team.

author: mathmatt88
title: Pretty decent set...
review:
I got this set because I found it for $14.  I wouldn't have purchased it otherwise - although the price is about right.
  
Pros:
Some fairly rare parts I have have not encountered.  (I came out with 3 new parts!)
For a kid, I assume the playability is great!
Minifig faces are neat!

Cons:
WAY too many stickers - I don't apply stickers so my boats are fairly boring.
The fish launcher is fun, but the fish doesn't stay in the barrel, let alone fire affectively.

If you can find the set for cheap, purchase for the kids or for the valuable parts!
